dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: graphic
dataModel.author: J. Harris

entity.entitySummary: This table stores information about a graphical files related to vegetation plots.
entity.entityDescription: Graphical files currently can include: gif, jpeg, and tiff file formats. It is recognized that many graphical files, especially remote sensing digital photographs may be gigabytes in size and for this reason the database developers are considering limiting the size of the files stored in the plots database.

attribute.attDefinition: This is an internal database identifier assigned to each unique grapical file.

attribute.attNotes: Foregin key into the plot table.
attribute.attDefinition: This represents the link between a graphical file and a specific plot.

attribute.attNotes: This may, in later versions, become domain locked to a few specif types of graphical files. Currently any file type can be stored.
attribute.attDefinition: The type of the graphical file format.
